attributes.title: The Power of Words || Part 5 || Shiva Sutras || 13 July 2006
attributes.description:
Name Of The Program : Shiva Sutras Part 5
Session on: Be Aware When You Create Your Words
Date : 13 July 2006
Venue : Adikailaasa, Bidadi, Bengaluru

In this video Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism HDH #Nithyananda Paramashivam gives a detailed explanation on one of the techniques that Lord #Shiva has said. This is an video excerpt on Shiva #Sutras conducted on 13 July 2006 in Adikailaasa, Bidadi, Bengaluru. Here HDH also insist people to be aware while you create your words.

https://youtu.be/5mxCV8s9Mo4. Part 1
https://youtu.be/qv7fVLwiOc8.     Part 2
https://youtu.be/tB02zCXn7Qw.   Part 3
https://youtu.be/7wBCBxcyjFs.    Part 4
https://youtu.be/gW0FsGhFYkM  Part 6
